name: PayTM Mobile Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
overview:
PayTM is an Indian electronic commerce company headquartered in Noida, India. It is a simple and secure destination for prepaid Mobile, DTH and Data Card recharges in India. Paytm was established in November 2009 as a fully owned subsidiary of One97 Communications Limited. Paytm offers prepaid mobile recharge for all Indian mobile operators including Airtel, Vodafone, BSNL, Reliance, Idea, Uninor, Tata Docomo, Tata Indicom, Aircel, MTS, Loop Mobile, MTNL, Virgin Mobile and Videocon. Customers can also buy DTH recharge for Tata Sky, Dish TV, Airtel Digital TV, Reliance Digital TV, Videocon d2h and Sun Direct.

Paytm also offers payment gateway services for enabling merchants to accept secure payments on Mobile (IVR, WAP, SMS, Mobile app) and Web through Credit card, Debit card, Internet banking and prepaid cash cards.
